description: This file defines the NoteDao interface for data access operations related to 'Note' objects in an Android application using Room persistence library. It provides methods for retrieving, inserting, updating, and deleting notes, with specific queries for listing all notes, searching, and fetching by ID.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface for 'Note' database operations, including fetching, searching, inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered with pinned first, then by most recent update.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Returns notes matching a search query in title or content, with pinned notes prioritized.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note or replaces an existing one on conflict, returning the new note's ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its unique identifier.
